entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text: @JStein_WaPo @jdawsey1 Maybe if @WhiteHouse had a competent response to the coronavirus, the markets would not be so spooked. The stupidity and ignorance of @realDonaldTrump is making this so much worse. No one trusts him. Nor should we.
